text: Abyssobrotula is a genus of cusk eel in the family Ophidiidae. ==Species== There are currently 2 recognized species in this genus: * Abyssobrotula galatheae J. G. Nielsen, 1977 * Abyssobrotula hadropercularis Ohashi & J. G. Nielsen, 2016 Ohashi, S. & Nielsen, J.G. (2016): A new species of Abyssobrotula (Ophidiiformes, Ophidiidae) from the Kuril-Kamchatka Trench. Zootaxa, 4132 (4): 559–566. ==References== Category:Ophidiidae Category:Deep sea fish
title: Abyssobrotula
